reviews.review_msg:
Doc was one of the greatest educators I've ever had at any level of education. He was incredibly knowledgeable, and his class was interesting and practical. He had high expectations, but gave you the tools to meet them.

I am so glad I had the opportunity to learn from him, and this class will never be the same without him.

Rest in peace, Doc.

My interest for Physio Rehab has just rose to another level because of this one prof. He's an actual doctor, he knows his stuff, crystal clear, amazing attitude, extremely helpful not only in the course, but in real life too. His exams are fair, his marking is easy, will give bonus marks to your essays if you show interest. TAKE IT WITH HIM.

Amazing professor.  I loved the course and Doc is incredibly helpful and interesting.  If you engage yourself in the class and show interest it is a great class and many life opportunities can be offered by the Doc and the lab instructors.
ONE OF THE BEST PROFS EVER! Super engaged during lecture! Exams are fair, MC can be pretty tricky but if you know your material its totally doable!

This class is well worth taking. Exams are difficult in the sense that the MC require great attention to detail. Great proff if you like sarcastic humor and wit. No reason anyone can't do decently in this class if they study. Also, everything you learn is knowledge that you can transfer later on in your life! Highly recommend!

Great course. Practical and interesting. His exams are straight forward, and while not easy, certainly manageable. he is not trying to trick anyone and genuinely wants them to do well and be involved in the material. Very approachable and gives lots of examples in class, which helped me remember concepts. Take this course!

His M/C are difficult, but they're totally doable. Anyone who tells you otherwise is whining. Arnheim textbook is amazing, the other one you can do without. Know everything. If that seems unreasonable, you're in university now. It's time to put on the big boy pants.

absolutely one of THE best profs because of his attitude. Very motivating. He is a MD so he shares lots of stories that pertain to each lecture. he is straight-up and fair. Exams were totally fine. Textbook is used as reference and aren't mandatory, however it's a good idea to buy for future reference text. Super practical class!

I was excited to take this class. Until I grew to loath it. His multiple choice questions are not reasonable, and I have no idea what he expects us to learn. His notes are simplistic, yet he keeps telling us those are all the notes we need to know. He also mumbles too much.

Great class on sports injuries and fun labs learning taping and assessment techniques. The practical final was stressful to say the least. The MC for the final was tricky as heck. A knowledgeable prof and tells interesting injury scenarios he has encountered. Only downside would be the very simplistic point-form notes and that he mumbles at times.
awesome prof! very helpful about rearranging my midterm, very interesting during lectures. kept me awake during 830 class
Great guy, glad to read he's still around.  Very passionate about the topic of sports injuries.
Talks like rapid-firing but that keeps us awake. Very knowledgeable since he's a doctor, and he often tells us interesting scenarios that he's encountered. Exams are fair. Good prof!
great prof. he know his stuff VERY well~and the examples he gave is funny and helpful. exam is fair. Great class, great prof

By the end of the semester this was my least favourite class (odd considering I want to be a physio).  Good prof though, great stories.  Lab is very useful.  Realistically you dont' have any work till midterm/final but keep up and writedown ankle, elbow etc. treatment cause these will be tested.  Final written is expected/easy, MC = very difficult!
nice guy

this is my favorite class ever, the prof is great, he knows everything backwards and forwards. gives you all the lecture notes at the start of the year so you only have to jot down small notes and can actually pay attention. great practical course if your interested its easy to get an A
Very imformative, and very nice.
What a fantastic course! So much interesting things to learn that are actually PRACTICAL in everyday life. (I tape up my boyfriend's ankle all the time now). Prepare to study hard!
awesome notes...very knowledgable and easy to understand...
Awesome prof. Knows what he is talking about. His lect notes are good but you are expected to write down a lot of what he says. Exams are fair and are the SAME EVERY YEAR!!! ;)
doc hedges was an awesome prog because he actually knew what he was talking about because he's been in most of the situations that we discussed in class
